meanings.definition: Covered with woolly or fine hair.
meanings.sent1: The lanated teddy bear felt soft and fuzzy.
meanings.sent2: The lanated sheep looked warm in its thick coat.
meanings.sent3: The lanated sweater made him look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her lanated scarf was like a cozy hug around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The lanated blanket was a comforting embrace on the chilly night.

meanings.definition: Having a woolly or fine hair-like texture.
meanings.sent1: The lanated fabric was gentle against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The lanated plant leaves rustled softly in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The lanated pillow felt like resting on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: His lanated gloves were like wearing warm clouds on his hands.
meanings.sent5: The lanated carpet was a soft cushion under their feet.
